column1: [119]  The  assessor  has  not  separately  allowed  the  tax  credit  amount  of  Rs.
15,945,648/- in terms of section 136 of the IRA 2006 and the Commissioner in
his written submissions has stated that the Appellant is entitled to claim the said
tax credits for the year of assessment 2010/2011 (pp 98-99 of the TAC brief).
The Commissioner has however stated that:
